Patriar_003.synopsis: Dialog with one of the patriars in the Audience Hall.Possible states:Ceremony - Gortash is in the Ceremony dialog with another player.After Ceremony - one-liner after the ceremony is ended.
Patriar_003.how_to_trigger: - Debug Book - Go To Region - Act 3 - WYR - Audience Hall- approach Gortash- "Ceremony" dialog will be started.- Use another character to click on the NPCs to get "CEREMONY IN PROGRESS" greeting node.- Finish "Ceremony" dialog with Gortash.- Click on the NPC to get "GORTASH ARCHDUKE" greeting node.

Patriar_001.how_to_trigger: - Debug Book - Go To Region - Act 3 - WYR - Audience Hall- approach Gortash- "Ceremony" dialog will be started.- Use another character to click on the NPCs to get "CEREMONY IN PROGRESS" greeting node.- Finish "Ceremony" dialog with Gortash.- Click on the NPC to get "GORTASH ARCHDUKE" greeting node.

Patriar_003_0.speaker: Lady Winstra Hullhollyn
Patriar_003_0.text: It's so hard to hear from back here.
Patriar_003_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed, annoyed - thinks they should have been given better seats

Patriar_003_1.speaker: Lady Winstra Hullhollyn
Patriar_003_1.text: I hope the new Archduke throws more parties than Ravengard. He was too serious for my liking.

Patriar_003_2.speaker: Lady Winstra Hullhollyn
Patriar_003_2.text: Finally, a leader with some charisma. Ravengard was quite the dullard.

Patriar_007_0.speaker: Lord Petric Amber
Patriar_007_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed, doesn't want to talk - focused on ceremony

Patriar_007_1.speaker: Lord Petric Amber
Patriar_007_1.text: A safe city is a wealthy city. So long as the new Archduke holds up his side of the arrangement, he'll have my support.
Patriar_007_1.context: NodeContext: Respectful, with a slight edge - if Gortash fails, this guy will take action

Patriar_007_2.speaker: Lord Petric Amber
Patriar_007_2.text: Times of strife produce the finest leaders. Archduke Gortash will be no exception.

Patriar_002_0.speaker: Admiral Peil Hullhollyn
Patriar_002_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed, trying to be helpful

Patriar_002_1.speaker: Admiral Peil Hullhollyn
Patriar_002_1.text: Archduke Gortash is the future of this city. What a glorious future it will be.

Patriar_002_2.speaker: Admiral Peil Hullhollyn
Patriar_002_2.text: A good leader knows when to step aside. Ravengard did the right thing.

Patriar_005_0.speaker: Lady Silifrey Sashenstar
Patriar_005_0.text: I knew we should have accepted sooner. Can't see a bloody thing.
Patriar_005_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed, annoyed - doesn't have a good seat

Patriar_005_1.speaker: Lady Silifrey Sashenstar
Patriar_005_1.text: People like him are meant to follow, not lead. Archduke Gortash will realise that soon enough.

Patriar_005_2.speaker: Lady Silifrey Sashenstar
Patriar_005_2.text: What are they thinking, giving a fellow like that such power? I give him a year at most.

Patriar_008_0.speaker: Lady Haeril Birch
Patriar_008_0.text: Shhh. It's just about to become interesting...
Patriar_008_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed, attention focused on the ceremony about to start

Patriar_008_1.speaker: Lady Haeril Birch
Patriar_008_1.text: The sooner this wretched war ends, the better. It's far too expensive.

Patriar_008_2.speaker: Lady Haeril Birch
Patriar_008_2.text: The Absolute's blight will be a hard one to cure. Gortash is the Archduke for the job.

Patriar_004_0.speaker: Lord Milon Tillerturn
Patriar_004_0.context: NodeContext: Whispered, excitable - trying not to disrupt event

Patriar_004_1.speaker: Lord Milon Tillerturn
Patriar_004_1.text: No sense in fighting change. Better to move with the times, I say.
Patriar_004_1.context: NodeContext: Proud to be part of history

Patriar_004_2.speaker: Lord Milon Tillerturn
Patriar_004_2.text: A commoner made Archduke of Baldur's Gate - never thought I'd see the day.
Patriar_004_2.context: NodeContext: He can't work out if he's okay with this or not

Patriar_006_0.speaker: Lady Eshvelt Guthmere
Patriar_006_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed, trying not to disrupt ceremony

Patriar_006_1.speaker: Lady Eshvelt Guthmere
Patriar_006_1.text: There's something I find reassuring about him. The city's never felt so safe.

Patriar_006_2.speaker: Lady Eshvelt Guthmere
Patriar_006_2.text: An Archduke. Finally someone who'll stand up to those wretched Absolutists.

Patriar_001_0.speaker: Lord Randolf Vammas
Patriar_001_0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed, whispered - event in progress

Patriar_001_1.speaker: Lord Randolf Vammas
Patriar_001_1.text: With Gortash in charge, this city will thrive. As will we all, of course.

Patriar_001_2.speaker: Lord Randolf Vammas
Patriar_001_2.text: Archduke Gortash... Now there's a man who knows good business.
Patriar_001_2.context: NodeContext: Impressed, smug - thinks he's great at business himself
